name: I Miss Autumn Already
description:
Mother Nature does not want to go to sleep just yet. She plays a game where she tries to catch the snow with the falling leaves of the trees. It can never last forever, but it keeps her mind busy.

Press left and right (or A and D) to control the wind and move the leaves so that the snow melts on their warm surfaces before reaching the ground. Drag the mouse from one leaf to another so that they may connect. Connected leaves are wider, fall slower, and catch the wind much faster (at a maximum of four connected leaves).

This marks my first released project created in Godot. Still getting used to it, but I've finally gotten into a good workflow.

Font: Sleepy Rabbit by deedeetype

Sounds: Wind by Inpsector J, Leaf breaking sounds by falcospizaetus
